review:
I was having pain and doctor had not recommended any medicine. She was not friendly. And also for the xray, the money I’ve paid. I’ve not received any receipt and photo copy of xray.

*** **** **** * ****** **** ** **** **** *******
Doctor is experienced, it speaks out of her work. Guided well! Thank you for the smooth and seamless experience

review: Doctor Lavanya spoke to me. She addressed the issue in a very professional manner. Very glad to get my problem resolved by her. Will recommend to everyone for any kind of dental issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I hope I will be recovered soon doctor and after completing tablets which u gave me, again how many days I need to continue with same tablets? But anyways I m satisfied with ur treatment Doctor Lavanya :)
The prices told over the phone when taking appointment and the prices after the treatment are double, they should frankly tell the amount exactly
reply_text: With black stains on teeth you have come for cleaning after 4yrs,Exact Price of teeth cleaning cannot be told on phone without having a proper checkup of one's teeth.we told you approximate price on phone  because u were insisting,we also informed you that the actual price may vary depending on your stains,you happily left seeing your teeth, thought you were satisfied with the result.Teeth cleaning once in every 3 months is advisable fr u.
